metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Tourism and Art when the Government will construct decent houses for game scouts and other officers at the following places in Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the tarring of Nchelenge-Mununga-Kaputa via Chienge Road will commence;
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the road works;
(c)    which contractor was engaged to tar the road; and

(d)    whether the project includes reconstruction of the Mununga-Kalungwishi Bridge. NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY Mr Chipungu Formulate Policy on Heritage Sites:  That this House urges the Government to formulate policy that will enable local communities, in collaboration with the Government, to secure heritage sites. 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply.
